participant_1.background:
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.
My biggest challenge is balancing my social life with my work and family.
I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills.
I am close to my family, but I sometimes have to spend time alone to recharge.
i am a morning person.

participant_2.background:
I hike and camp with my friends for exercise and to enjoy nature.
i want to be a doctor.
i am a grown woman.
Toronto summers are crazy but I manage to stay sane with the help of my black lab.
i have trouble getting along with family.

content.text: I am doing well, thank you! How are you doing today?
I am doing great, thanks for asking!
So, what's been going on with you lately?
Well, I've been hiking and camping with my friends a lot. We love being active and enjoying nature.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love being outdoors too.
Yeah, it's great. I'm also trying to become a doctor, so I've been studying a lot.
Wow, that's a lot of work! But I'm sure you'll do great.
I have a black lab who helps me stay sane during Toronto summers.  I have trouble getting along with my family, but I try to stay in touch with them.
Oh, that's too bad. I'm glad you have your dog to help you through tough times.
So, what are your plans for the future?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going to medical school after I graduate, but I'm not sure what specialty I want to pursue.
Well, I'm sure you'll figure it out. You seem like a smart person.
